description: Numbers that are palindromic in base 8.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
P. De Geest, Palindromic numbers beyond base 10
mathematica: f[n_,b_] := Module[{i=IntegerDigits[n,b]}, i==Reverse[i]]; lst={}; Do[If[f[n,8], AppendTo[lst,n]], {n,1000}]; lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 08 2009 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_
